data: Refer to Modified Glasgow Coma Scale (GCS) for Infants and Children
q4h, assess for sucking, swallow, gag, palmar grasp, plantar grasp and startle reflexes
q6h, assess for sucking, swallow, gag, palmar grasp, plantar grasp and startle reflexes
q1h, assess for sucking, swallow, gag, palmar grasp, plantar grasp and startle reflexes
q2h, assess for sucking, swallow, gag, palmar grasp, plantar grasp and startle reflexes
q3h, assess for sucking, swallow, gag, palmar grasp, plantar grasp and startle reflexes
q4h, assess muscle strength, colour, warmth and sensation to all 4 limbs
q6h, assess muscle strength, colour, warmth and sensation to all 4 limbs
q1h, assess muscle strength, colour, warmth and sensation to all 4 limbs
q2h, assess muscle strength, colour, warmth and sensation to all 4 limbs
q3h, assess muscle strength, colour, warmth and sensation to all 4 limbs
